amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being available for the American Ballet Theatre, New York, New York, for educational activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the American Ballet Theatre, New York, New York, for educational activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 312 (Roll no. 668).
